sources.title: Distant Drums (1951)
sources.description: After destroying a Seminole fort, American soldiers and their rescued companions must face the dangerous Everglades and hostile Indians in order to reach safety Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/distant-drums-1951/

sources.title: Distant Drums (1951) Gary Cooper · Mari Aldon
sources.description: 1840. The US Army is attempting to drive the last remaining Seminola Indians out of Florida. Captain Quincy Wyatt (Gary Cooper) is ordered to destroy a fort where smugglers store the weapons they supply to the Indians...

metadata.Plot: Navy Lieutenant Tufts accompanies scout Quincy Wyatt into the Everglades to rout the Seminole Indians who are threatening the early settlers in Florida. When the command is forced to run, Wyatt and Seminole Chief Oscala square off in an exciting climax.
metadata.Actors: Gary Cooper, Mari Aldon, Richard Webb
